Param.h2: Search UCSF Profiles from your Website
Param.p: By adding the UCSF Profiles Mini Search box to your website your site visitors can find UCSF researchers, potential collaborators, and mentors directly from your site. To get started, contact profiles@ucsf.edu
See a demo at San Francisco General Hospital (SFGH)
Param.blockquote:
It was very easy to add the Mini Search box with the very clear instructions I received. It allowed us to increase the accuracy and availability of the data on our site and to put an amazing search tool at the fingertips of our researchers.
